comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: Be carful guys, he is promoting a scam website that ask you to enter your wallet seeds. He is playing it dumb but he is a snake and a scammer

comments.author: Jeger.Kiting
comments.body: Quote from: GxSTxV on September 15, 2022, 07:33:22 PMBe carful guys, he is promoting a scam website that ask you to enter your wallet seeds. He is playing it dumb but he is a snake and a scammerYes you are right, I also suspect he wants to commit a scam by using this link for all to see. I think this is an old form of fraud using links like this and everyone here must have known it with a classic form of fraud like this. So be aware of these scammers and what the OP already linked to.
